title: What is the Product Property?
text: If a is a real number and $$m$$ and $$n$$ are integers, then: $$a^m a^n=a^{m+n}$$
speech: If a is a real number and  m  and  n  are integers, then: , a to the m-th a to the n-th is equal to, a raised to the m plus n power
pacedSpeech: If a is a real number and   m
are integers, then:  , a to the m-th a to the n-th is equal to, a raised to the m plus n power

title: Simplifying the Expression
speech: y raised to the 5 plus 6 power  becomes  y to the eleventh
pacedSpeech: y raised to the 5 plus 6 power
